active_learning.discussion_prompt: To what extent do compliance training programs truly change employee behavior versus serving as a legal checkbox? Debate using examples from NIST SP 800-50 lifecycle stages and metrics for behavior change, referencing real-world cases like HIPAA violations.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

additional_activities.activity: Think-pair-share on common misconceptions (e.g., 'Compliance training eliminates all risks').
Role-play breach response simulations incorporating training takeaways.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Compliance Training Programs (Topic Hierarchy: Level 1 Cybersecurity > Level 2 Security And Risk Management > Level 3 Legal, Regulatory, and Compliance > Level 4 GRC > Level 5 Compliance Management and Oversight > Level 6 Compliance Training Programs). Incorporate this research context: Compliance training educates on CIA Triad, CPLP (role-based awareness/training/education), NIST CSF functions (Identify-Protect-Detect-Respond-Recover-Govern), NIST SP 800-50 lifecycle (Planning: needs analysis; Analysis/Design: role-based content; Development/Implementation: delivery methods; Assessment/Improvement: metrics like completion rates, knowledge tests, behavior indicators—drives continuous improvement). Metrics include pre/post assessments, behavior change. Sources: NIST SP 800-50 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/Legacy/SP/nistspecialpublication800-50.pdf), NIST CSF 2.0 (https://www.nist.gov/cyberframework). Prior knowledge: CIA Triad, risk basics. Learning Objectives (Bloom's): [Insert the learning_objectives array here]. Scaffolding Layers: [Insert scaffolding_layers here]. Active Learning: [Insert active_learning here]—tie flashcards to these for application. Generate 25 flashcards using the exact schema: [Insert flashcard_schema here]. Ensure completeness: Cover truncated NIST sections (metrics/evaluation), voter priorities (pedagogy, scaffolding). Balance Bloom's (lower: 40%, higher: 60%).
